```pddl
['(:action stay
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?location - place ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (available ?npc) (in ?npc ?location) (stocked ?npc ?resource))
    :effect (and (sheltered ?npc) (not (exposed ?npc)))
)',
 '(:action get_food
    :parameters (?npc - agent ?food - object)
    :precondition (and (non_perishable ?food) (inStorage ?food) (available ?npc))
    :effect (and (stocked ?npc ?food) (not (inStorage ?food)))
)',
 '(:action get
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?resource - object)
    :precondition (and (inStorage ?resource) (available ?actor))
    :effect (and (obtained ?actor ?resource) (not (inStorage ?resource)))
)']
```
